abstract_summ: In this study, a dataset of X-ray images from patients with common viral pneumonia, bacterial pneumonia, confirmed Covid-19 disease was utilized for the automatic detection of the Coronavirus disease . In order to get an idea about the COVID-19 detection transparency, we employed the concept of Gradient Class Activation Map for detecting the regions where the model paid more attention during the classification . The overall accuracy was measured as 95.3%{+/-}0.02.02 .
